import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './ManageEstimate.css'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Footer from './Footer'; const ManageEstimate = () => { const [estimates, setEstimates] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:8080/estimate/all') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setEstimates(data)) .catch((error) => console.error('Error fetching estimates:', error)); }, []); return (

); }; export default ManageEstimate;
